channel.title: Who the hell created runescape and started the scpae series?
channel.description: hi im here to ask a question who the hell made runescape and invented all these method public booleans voids .java's classes was it jagex or was it a normal guy just like us??

item.title: Who the hell created runescape and started the scpae series?
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

own master:

i dont play rs LOL and im asking this nicely whats a troll (plz dont flame)??

a troll is someone who posts inflammatory, extraneous, or off-topic messages in an online community, such as an online discussion forum, chat room, or blog, with the primary intent of provoking other users into a desired emotional response or of otherwise disrupting normal on-topic discussion. I <3 Wikipedia.

And all of you guys mentioned Andrew and Paul Gower, but what about Ian Gower? He helped develop Runescape as the team’ s modeller.

Read full topic

item.title: Who the hell created runescape and started the scpae series?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

own master:

THANKS all of those who posted nicely and i have another question did jagex buy it or they stole it??

pure2ownage:

I created voids and some other dude on mitb created booleans and .javas, then when we was on a site showing off our work some dude leeched our source code and said he made it. Therefore SUN is a leech-much-company and therefore your thread is stupid, come on who didn’t know this…?

= Yes they have stole it from My professional team of developers consisting of _s, Alec, myself, me and I.

Read full topic

item.title: Who the hell created runescape and started the scpae series?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

RuneScape

RuneScape is a fantasy MMORPG developed and published by Jagex, which released in January 2001. RuneScape was originally a browser game built with the Java programming language, but was largely replaced by a standalone C++-coded client in 2016. The game has had over 200 million accounts created and is recognised by the Guinness World Records as the world's largest and most-updated free MMORPG. RuneScape takes place in the world of Gielinor, a medieval fantasy realm divided into different kingdoms...

kthxbye.

Read full topic

item.title: Who the hell created runescape and started the scpae series?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Java was created by Sun Microsystems. They created the language. (the booleans, voides, .java’s etc)

RuneScape was written in Java by a ‘normal guy’, but you can guess he was better at Java than most of us.

Read full topic
